sections.text:
46-1213.Licensed water well contractor, defined.

Licensed water well contractor means an individual who has obtained a license from the department and who is a principal officer, director, manager, or owner-operator of any business engaged in the construction or decommissioning of water wells.

SourceLaws 1986, LB 310, ยง 13;Laws 2001, LB 667, ยง 15;Laws 2007, LB463, ยง 1152.
